create procedure dbo.USR_UM_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_EDIT_UMHSAFFILIATIONCATEGORY ( @ID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier, @UMHSAFFILIATIONBASENAME nvarchar(100), @UMHSAFFILIATIONBASEDESCRIPTION nvarchar(500), @UMHSAFFILIATIONCATEGORYCODEID uniqueidentifier ) as
set nocount on;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
BEGIN TRY -- handle updating the data UPDATE dbo.USR_UMHS_AFFILIATIONBASE SET UMHSAFFILIATIONBASENAME = @UMHSAFFILIATIONBASENAME, UMHSAFFILIATIONBASEDESCRIPTION = @UMHSAFFILIATIONBASEDESCRIPTION, UMHSAFFILIATIONCATEGORYCODEID = @UMHSAFFILIATIONCATEGORYCODEID, CHANGEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID, DATECHANGED = @CURRENTDATE WHERE ID = @ID END TRY
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0;
